CustomField.description: In case user is part of an automation (i.e. Outreach integration, Netsuite integraton), we expect this field value to be TRUE. This field will be used in order to determine if a record created by automation. i.e. If Record.CreatedBy.Service Account = TRUE when the record is created by an automation. LAMBDA-36987
CustomField.inlineHelpText: In case user is part of an automation (i.e. Outreach integration, Netsuite integraton), we expect this field value to be TRUE
CustomField.label: Service Account
